caption: Really flavorful, great service!! We had tikka Marsala & the cauliflower wings and we are impressed thank you so much!
This place is amazing the service is wonderful and the food is awesome whenever i am in Miami i am eating the cauliflower wings and tofu wings the best vegan food ever.
Great food! Great customer service! Great chef! Recommended to everyone

The food was awful. It was poorly prepared cooked mush. We told the chef this, paid,  out of courtesy, to support a new plant based restaurant on the beach, and never returned. This was an Indian restaurant before it became Nirvana. It …
Best food in Miami. We tried vegetable soup and chana masala. Both were delicious. You won’t miss meat. Vegan food here is so tasty !
The food and service was amazing!! Best cauliflower wings i’ve ever had
Absolutely incredible. Hidden gem. You will not regret dining here. Please go support them!

I kept seeing this place, so I decided to try it.  The smoothies seem to have a lot of kratom in them.  I purchased the mayasian runner just before the gym.  The lentils were filling.  It was a smaller bowl.  I also liked the kale sagym.  I finished the malaysian runner last hoping it will help in the gym.  Overall good
This restaurant blew me away! Service was great and the food was delicious. Get the cauliflower wings!! They were so good we got a second order.
This place was delicious.  Cauliflower wings are the best. Very friendly and very fresh. I will definitely be back.
The food was amazing, i was the only vegan on my family and everyone loves the place! If u go, have to taste the coco pudding dessert
They are the best vegan option in Miami Beach!!! I am obsessed with them.
Great to see another switch to vegan food. Great wings and naan bread! Nice Indian flavors, made with love.

It's a go to restaurant if you want vegan version of the Indian food close to South beach in Miami. The food was pretty tasty and you wouldn't believe that it is vegan unless someone tells you. The owner and the staff were very friendly. Give it a try and encourage restaurants serving vegan Indian food as they are very rare to find.

Came to visit Miami for the first time for the week and have been searching for vegan spots to eat in the area. Came across Nirvana and was very delighted with the freshness of the food and with the flavor. The family that operates it is very nice and were very helpful.

I ate at this place back in February. I'm from Houston and was visiting Miami. I ate here 2 days in a row..lol.  I was very pleased and satisfied with their food. The atmosphere was very chill and the family that run and operate this …

Delicious food and excelent service. I was looking for a vegan restaurant in Miami Beach and this place exceeded my expectations. Delicious cauliflower wings and tofu masala. Will definitely go again next time I'm in Miami!

Best vegan restaurant in South Beach! The food was absolutely amazing and delicious! Everything was flavorful and perfectly seasoned. The cauliflower app is a must have! Teresa did an amazing job with dish recommendations after I told her a …

We were welcomed warmly and offered a nice table. The menu is simple but interesting. Our dishes - eggplant, cabbage with coconut and brown rice were all tasty and well presented. The eggplant in a lovely delicate curry sauce was in small …
Wonderful family run vegan restaurant Believe you will never wrong here Not a exaggeration but real fact Give them a shot

I was on south beach lunch for some burger it was closed then stopped at burger king I eat their but I was very curious for plant based food even though I am a southern meat eater  tried them in evening you can’t believe the cauliflower …
Love Vegan food, hard to find a good authentic Vegan restaurant in Miami. Glad I came across Nirvana. Amazing vibes and great food. Recommend to all Vegans.
Amazing food! Especially the Cauliflower Wings. Love the atmosphere and owner makes you feel like home. Great find in the heart of South Beach.

The prices  were great, the wings amazing  the portion filling,  but I rather order for pick up, it's not a good place for a date.  My girlfriend had a serious issue with the smell inside so we sat outside where we witness a homeless person urinating on the sidewalk.  I would say order for delivery or pickup but it's not a date.

Such a wonderful place to eat vegetarian blessed food You will no go wrong Excellent service so accommodating, only they don’t have is outside Fan Super clean washroom and the aroma of food was so good tofu tikka masala was fascinating
Delicious, plant-based food and warm staff! They have adequate portions and shareable dishes. Delicious even for those who eat meat! This kind of food is better for our health and the environment!

An amazing find. Who would think of these combinations of styles and flavors? Been there three times. Going back. The cauliflower wings alone are worth the trip. The calliloo was delicious. Carrot pudding incredible! Culinary creativity at its finest.

The food was absolutely great! Honestly the cauliflower wings was amazing, really good taste, the potato dumplings are great as well😁 the service was good and the location is very nice, great pricing as well. A must try if your in the South Beach area.
Amazing cauliflower wings!  Everything so good! Don't hesitate!
Amazing food. Get the spicy cauliflower.

Amazing resturaunt! Every dish is flavorful and hearty yet healthy and exceptional! And the staff are so helpful and friendly. All around a wonderful dining experience and a gem on South Beach! Been coming weekly since I arrived in Miami and will make it a destination when I return! ❤️
Incredible vegan food. The empanadas and Tofu tikka masala were perfection. Staff is very kind and welcoming.
Cauliflower Wings Amazingly Great! It’s a must have. Staff Teresa was attentive and friendly. Highly recommend.

Super clean, pretty interior, DELICIOUS food! I love the calm vibe of the restaurant and the Indian and Southeast Asian dishes are so tasty and healthy. I am bringing my vegan boyfriend back for our next daytime date. 10/10 ♥️

A **MUST** VISIT IN MIAMI!  We LOVE Nirvana! And we LOVE Teresa! ❤️❤️❤️ We have been coming daily for lunch during our visit to Miami. Teresa is SO lovely and the food is SO tasty. You MUST get the cauliflower wings, tomato soup, black …

This place is AMAZING. If you’re lucky enough to get Teresa as your server, even better. She is awesome!  Now the epic vegan food...  You have to get the cauliflower wings as they are literally the best thing ever. The crunchy outside …
A comfortable place, very nice staff, especially that Mexican woman Teresa, great service, Congrats!
Amazing food, great services. Best Vegan Restaurant in South Beach. Collie flower Rings are a MUST TRY! Highly Recommended. All the Best
Fantastic vegan spot with mouth watering blessed your food Not waiting go back again again Hats up for the team

I don’t even know where to begin, this place is so wonderful. If you’re in Miami, you need to make Nirvana a priority, whether you’re plant-based/vegan or not. The food is all super fresh and delicious. They have really unique drink options …

(Translated by Google) Good choice of healthy and delicious food! The attention of the staff very good, especially Teresa who was excellent!  (Original) Buena opción de comida saludable y deliciosa! La atención de el personal muy buena, especialmente de Teresa que fue excelente!

All the dishes are so yummy. I ordered cauliflower wings, potato dumplings, veg patties, Mixed veg tacos. After that I ordered spinach and potato with brown rice. for the desert I  ordered cheesecake. It was yummy.Good place, good service. Full value for money. I will visit this place again.
(Translated by Google) Excellent place very tasty food, very good atmosphere and fantastic service  (Original) Exelente lugar muy sabrosa comida, muy buen ambiente y fantástico servicio
The place is in a good location near to the beach and hotel. About the food, so good... Tofu tikka masala delicious ❤️
This restaurant is amazing, for to be honest the food are delicious, the cauliflower wings ¡¡WOW!! I'll come back
Amazing choices and great service We were looking for a vegan place and this restaurant is a great blend of hospitality taste and a nice ambience Would recommend absolutely
(Translated by Google) An Excellent place ... Recommended, you will have a great time ...  (Original) Un Excelente lugar... Recomendado, te pasarás de lo lindo...
I was looking for healthy cuisine, found a dirty kitchen ....I will pass.
¡¡¡The place is wonderful!!! The food is the best I have ever had. I 100% recommend this place. Thank you for your kindness and attention. ❤️❤️❤️❤️
Loads and loads of options...healthy and tasty food
Superb
Great food and great price. Definitely check it out if you are in the Miami beach area. Would recommend.
Amazing food! Loved it ! ❤️
Beautiful resturant with top quality food and a friendly ambience perfect for any kind of gathering, must try cuisines it'll definitely get you hooked 💯
I had a wonderful experience at bistro. Every staff member I encountered were friendly, great menu choices at affordable prices. Definitely hope to go back!!

Don’t know where start from Let me tell you vegan cauliflower was so yummy can’t believe so much Flavour still my appetite  need more more Tofu tikka masala and spinach and corn so exotic can’t believe Brown rice so soft Finally desert …

Honestly the management was better when it first opened and I will never be returning. I had to openly whiteness a black female be verbally degraded for asking to use the restrooms, and let me tell you she would have been better off using …
Would not go back to this place. Steer clear. Trust me.

The food is the restaurant was not good. The owner cook had a dark energy. He made me a vegetarian wrap and none of the ingredients that were on the menu were on the wrap. Instead I got what were left over beans, some onions and a leftover …

The service was amazing. My partner and I tried all of the appetizers and EVERY SINGLE ONE WAS AMAZING! The Potato Dumplings and Califlower Wings are definitely something you must try when visiting. The Tinka Masala was also very delicious! …
The most delicious food in the area. If you are visiting South Beach you should check out these exquisite flavours.
The food was amazing. Especially the Carrot Pudding, it was worth it's weight in gold. The staff was also extremely kind and friendly. The food was also out incredibly fast.

The cauliflower wings are an explosion of flavor...unbelievable. Ginger and garlic are an understatement- they are more than just accompaniments. Potato dumplings were very comforting. Chef was generous with the sauces on dishes and the house hot sauce is amazing too.

Absolutely amazing!! We came from Chicago looking for anything vegan, these guys did not disappoint! The menu could use a little more description so we were weary at first, but after the first 2 dishes hit the table we were hooked! Highly recommend! The cauliflower wings will blow your mind!
Great plant based food well seasoned and great service.  Thank you so much!
Ambience and food meshed well. Great experience

A stellar and conscious family owned plant based bistro in the heart of Miami Beach. Every meal made with love and organic ingredients to make your soul feel good. Always good vibes and delicious foods.
Best vegan Indian inspired food we have had so far!!! Everything was so yummy..their Tofu Tikka Masala is a must try! Great place with beautiful ambiance. Highly recommended.
This place has amazing food . Very small and peaceful. Vegan and gluten-free!
My favorite plant based spot in South Beach. Great atmosphere, always excellent service, and everything on the menu is absolutely delicious! Won’t break the bank either!
Had a very good experience at Nirvana. Good atmosphere and excellent plant based food. Highly recommend.
Incredible! Best Indian vegan spot in Miami
This place has amazing organic vegan food it was so good!  We enjoyed the cauliflower and the quinoa bowl. Definitely coming back!!!
Great service and the spinach dish was amazing! Also get the wings!
Delicious food, must go!

This Place Blew my Mind 🤯 and I'm not even Vegan. Ordered Chana Masala , Spinach & Potato. The Cauliflower Wings were AMAZING   tasted like chicken  and had the General Zso Crunch to it. Very Yummy & Filling

We had an amazing dinner at Nirvana! The restaurant is relaxing and welcoming, with spa-like music and a comforting atmosphere. Our server was generous and attentive. The food was spectacular! We ordered a lot of goodies-the cauliflower and …

Excellent!  Best Indian food I have ever had!  Not heavy, not too hot, and overall perfect. Back home I would marvel at the Indian spices but, my stomach couldn’t take the heat and grease. Here the flavors and textures bounce at you, …
Great place, delicate and flavorful food, filling meal, great service

We had been to South Beach multiple times and most of the time being a vegetarian, we need to struggle with the food as the options are quite limited. I do love to try regional flavors but most of the time, the safest cuisine to get easily …

For starters finding vegan restaurants has always been a mission, with veganism on the rise they are popping up left and right however they don’t all meet the mark of  appetizing food or even a full vegan friendly menu. This place has all …
Very nice place for a date. Lovely service!
Very good food and great chill vibes from the owner.  We on vacation and had to stop there twice to get food. Highly recommended if you love great vegan food.
Awesome vegan food!!

Best restaurant with healthy food, good service, home made cooked food . We also got a dish on the house and he didn’t let us pay for the food. Very Blessed place , clean and good energy the all time we sit there for hours . Thank you Namaste - From Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba and Ana Maria Moga Highly recommended!

Friendly atmosphere and delicious plant based food made with love! I enjoy owners here as they are very welcoming people and easy to talk to. The food was spectacular and filled me up. I also tried the Kava honeydew flavor and unfortunately …

The food was delicious I had the Vegetable Empanada, Gluten Free It’s  Chickpeas with mixed vegetables and potatoes and sweet and tangy sauce. It was delicious. The owners were so attentive and friendly.I had  a pleasant conversation with …
The best vegan indian food I've ever had!
What an amazing place! I'm a meat lover and this place blown my mind. 10/10 but 5 stars because Google does not let me put more.

I've traveled and I've eat many of places but I kid you not this place just took the cake for the best place I've ever eaten! I'm sitting at the table still as I'm writing this. I don't even review places either but I haddddd to! Down to …
Fantastic Flavor, Friendly, Fast. Best vegetarian option we have found in Miami Beach. Thanks!
The place was very clean and set up according to Covid standards. The vibe of the whole restaurant was great. The food is amazing for Vegan and anyone wanting to fill their stomachs.

Fresh and flavorful homemade vegetarian food. This was my first time trying this cute family restaurant and I loved it. Great food and a warm welcome. I had the vegetable patties (pictured) and a yummy vegetable soup. Highly recommend!
Sublime vegan good, quick service, friendly staff.
Incredible service, real smooth kratom drinks with fresh and healthy ingredients. Highly recommended.
This was my first time here and I enjoyed a delicious meal. The service was excellent. I am not a vegetarian but I found the food quite delectable. I highly recommend Nirvana Bistro. - M
Delicious food with amazing service and very friendly staff. A must-try in SOBE!

So great!  We wanted something vegan and new on the beach.  This popped up on google maps and we gave it a shot.  Cauliflower wings and Mushroom, callaloo, baby corn a must! The cool drinks are so tasty and exotic. Plus, the waitress and bartender are so awesome.

First time and happy that we discovered it!  Great vegan place, for all my vegan and vegetarian peeps, you must try it! Nice staff, good and different menu and interesting juices!!! We will be back! Best of luck and much success!!!!
Nice food

Amazing place. Heaven for Vegans. The food is delicious, and drinks were out of this world. The staff and owner were really friendly. Will definitely recommend this place to anyone who are in Miami Beach.

Highly recommend this restaurant for anyone who is looking to enjoy a healthy plant based dish that is savory, delicious & filling. I was highly impressed today by the food and the customer service which won over my loyalty. Exceptional …
Best dish ever cant get enough!
Highly recommend this place. Amazing vegan food with good combination of drinks. Please come and try
Close to home, super calming atmosphere, friendly and informative service... I had their honey ginger kratom on tap and it was soo good, I didn’t want to drink it all— just so I could savor it.
This place is amazing. Very friendly and they have calming music. Honestly if I got to eat this every day I would turn vegan
Food & staff were amazing will definitely be back!
So good. Food portion is huge and the taste is superb. 5/5

Great vegan food. Definitely try the Cauliflower Wings and Potato Dumplings. The Cheesecake was spectacular. Owner came out and spoke to us, we had a lovely conversation with him, he even offered us a free drink and desert. Great place, will definitely come again when in the area. 👍

Where do I begin? This place is a gem. Plant based, healthy and delicious food... mostly vegan and Indian. The Kratom and kava drinks are the best I’ve had in Miami, do yourself a favor and try the Kratom Mai Tai. If you want to take a …
This place is amazing 🤩 down to earth staff. Price is cheap for the Mount of good taste in flavors. Might be the best food in south beach Miami. The truth said it 12-31-20 18:23
Visited on Fri I believe. Looking forward to returning with my friends. This place has a nice atmosphere.
Excellent! Tofu, spinach, corn with brown rice Cauliflower wings Please visit here if you’re in south beach Chef came to get our feedback, very nice.
Amazing food and service! Great place, I’m definitely coming back
Great food nice place to site. Owner and staff really friendly. Will definitely return soon.
Nice vegano food  exótica cheese cake

(Translated by Google) Very good service, very rich food and a very accessible price, 100% vegan 100% exquisite.  (Original) Muy buena atención, muy rica comida y un precio muy accesible, 100% vegano 100% exquisito.

THE FOOD WAS AMAZING!!! Everything is made fresh and the staff was so nice!! Best service in Miami!!! If your nearby you need to go here because this is the best food ever you don’t want to miss this!!
very original vegan food tast.
Delicious food & drinks.. Came with a few friends and tried some appetizers. The Buffalo cauliflower is amazing and worth a try. Will be back!
Love the food it was very tasty and the drinks are very good n the worker here is helpful. A great yo chill n drink n eat
Cute little spot with amazing vegan food. Mr.Santosh was friendly and polite. Food was delicious and reasonable.
Simply amazing, it’s very hard to find a vegan place in here but this is definitely a jewel! They just opened and it’s the best vegan in Miami Beach! It’s all vegan and delicious! Highly recommend
Best vegan place in Miami Beach ! I highly recommend the potato dumpling and caulifowers wings. The staff is amazing, I will definitely come back for drinks! They even organize live music events 🔥

Coming from a non vegan this menu makes me feel like I’d have noooo problem converting to a plant based diet considering just how delicious and balance the flavors of EVERY DISH Chef Santosh creates. The food has an Indian flair but like …
Great ambience! Loved the empanadas. Tried Nirvana Mai Tai was refreshing and new Great service and staff were very sweet

(Translated by Google) Excellent restaurant, exquisite food, very good service, an experience. We went as a family, to accompany one of my children who is vegan, and it was liked by the whole family, 100% recommended .....  (Original) …
The food was delicious and the atmosphere was amazing!
The service was very friendly and helpful. The cauliflower wing and veggie patties were delicious.

Wow the food is SO FLAVORFUL! The cauliflower wings and the vegetable empanadas are my favorite. The quality is superb. This truly is the best Vegan Spot, based on price & quality, on south beach. The botanical vibe is both artistic and …

Had the best time and experience at Nirvana!!! The vibe, the food, and the people were amazing. I’d definitely recommend all foodies and non-foodies to make the trip for a visit. Could for sure return just for the cauliflower wings!
Love the vibe and energy of the staff. Food super DELICIOUS and filling!

If you're vegan and need to help stay afloat while swimming in a pool full of (like the song goes)....yea, I recommend the Organic Quinoa  Yam. Good savory taste and will fill you up enough!  I will come back for drinks!
Brand new vegan spot

The food here is delicious and flavorful with seasonings. This is a vegan spot that'll be enjoyed by nonvegans who just want a healthy but delicious meal. I'm not vegan, but when I tried the cabbage and coconut, didn't have to be lol.
The vegan food is amazing. We had cauliflower wings, which is delicious, and vegetable empanada. Will definitely come back!
